attributes.action: Give tax incentives for merchant shipping to be UK registered and fly the red ensign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: and use shipping to carry out transporation of goods on coastal routes around the UK in order to remove some of the heavy goods traffic from the roads and reduce CO2 emmisions. Also to allow British Boatyards/shipyards to be given assistance in the design and construction of shipping to meet this requirement.
